<br>

We combined data from UNHCR's Syrian refugees per locality in Lebanon (as defined by UNHCR, from December 2018) with data on Lebanese voters per locality (using the 2018 elections). [The data can be accessed here.](https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.7910/DVN/YTUPB9)
